name: Don't Pray To Satan
description: Don't Pray To Satan is an unforgiving city simulator/strategy game, where you must monitor and prevent your city's inhabitants from praying to Satan and bringing about the end of days.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
